data.actual_result: the name of the person whose name you tapped appears in the box at the bottom
data.expected_result: nothing occurs or an error message states that you can't mention in that channel
data.short_description: If you tap a name in a channel that you don't have send messages access to, it shows you the mention in the chatbar at the bottom
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Go to a channel in which you lack the "send messages" permission  - Step 2: tap the person's name - etc
